properties.name: open-library.api.base-url
properties.description: The base URL of the Open Library API.

properties.name: open-library.api.paths.books.search-by-isbn
properties.description: The URL template used to search Books by ISBN using the Open Library API.

properties.name: authentication.jwt.public-key
properties.description: The Public Key used to verify JWTs.

properties.name: authentication.jwt.private-key
properties.description: The Private Key used to sign JWTs.

properties.name: authentication.jwt.duration
properties.description: The time in seconds a JWT is valid.

properties.name: authentication.jwt.fail_on_invalid
properties.description: A flag indicating whether the authentication process must fail if a JWT is invalid. Will discard the token if not valid.

properties.name: authentication.jwt.fail_on_blacklisted
properties.description: A flag indicating whether the authentication process must fail if a JWT is blacklisted. Will discard the token in such case.

properties.name: authentication.jwt.allow_anonymous
properties.description: A flag indicating whether a request with an invalid or blacklisted JWT can be interpreted as an anonymous request. However, note that if the endpoint is secured, the authentication will fail.
